channel.title: CVE Feed for Debian -- Debian Edu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Debian -- Debian Edu

item.title: CVE-2019-3467|2024-08-04T19:12:09.531Z -- debian -- debian%20edu
item.description: Debian-edu-config all versions < 2.11.10, a set of configuration files used for Debian Edu, and debian-lan-config < 0.26, configured too permissive ACLs for the Kerberos admin server, which allowed password changes for other Kerberos user principals.
